entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Québec
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quebec Lesage Int'l Airport 1:47 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
